lead_paragraph: The loss of Asmara will be felt keenly in Italy. This pleasant upland town is not only the oldest Italian colonial capital but the most completely Italian city in Africa. More than half of its 100,000 inhabitants are Italians. They are not newcomers, like the settlers who have flocked into Addis Ababa, but prosperous colonists with their roots in the soil for two generations.
abstract: eds on Asmara captured and Ital defeat in Africa

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
